argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rlimabs.1 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. V ) |
| 2 |  | rlimabs.2 | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> B ) ~~>r C ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_rlimmptrcl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rlimcl | |- ( ( k e. A |-> B ) ~~>r C -> C e. CC ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cjf | |- * : CC --> CC |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> * : CC --> CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cjcn2 | |- ( ( C e. CC /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. CC ( ( abs ` ( z - C ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( * ` z ) - ( * ` C ) ) ) < x ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. CC ( ( abs ` ( z - C ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( * ` z ) - ( * ` C ) ) ) < x ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 5, 2, 7, 9 | #P_rlimcn1b | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> ( * ` B ) ) ~~>r ( * ` C ) ) |
